article.title: Selective Dissemination of MARC: A User Evaluation
article.author: Buhr, Lorne R.
article.text: After outlining the terms of reference of an investigation of user reaction to the selective dissemination of MARC records, a summary of the types of users is given.. User response is analyzed and interpreted in the light of recent developments at the Library of Congress.. Implications for the future of SDI of MARC in a university setting conclude the paper..
